name: Tank Game Prototype (Mack)
description:
A simple game made in 3 days

Survive through waves of tanks. After each wave you can choose between 2 upgrades.  All upgrades have no limit

Controls:

  • WASD = move
  • Left-click = fire cannon
  • right-click = fire MG
  • F to jump out and jump back in your tank
  • While out of tank, hold left click to repair
